```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(rstanarm)
```

```{r outcomes_model, cache = TRUE}
all_games_dense <- readRDS("all_games_dense.RDS")

outcomes_model <- stan_glm(formula = outcome ~ me_white + elo_diff + NMoves + 
                             format + ECO_category:me_white,
         data = all_games_dense,
         refresh = 0)
```

```{r}
print(outcomes_model, digits = 6)
```


```{r elo_model, cache = TRUE}
elo_model <- stan_glm(formula = my_elo ~ Date + )
```
